title: Three Megatrends Transforming Internationalization of Higher Education
desc: Three Megatrends Transforming Internationalization of Higher Education: Implications for Research Agendas and Institutional Strategies With more than 6,000 post-secondary institutions, American higher system commands global reputation and admiration. The American system, however, it is inequitable and unsustainable in terms of its internationalization strategies and outcomes. The overarching purpose of this workshop is to share three megatrends that are shaping internationalization of higher education so that it can help researchers in defining future agendas and inform institutions in developing strategies. www.tc.columbia.edu/continuing-professional-studies/conferences-programs-workshops/all-offerings/three-megatrends-transforming-internationalization-of-higher-education/ This is a free, interactive, public event open to students, faculty, and administrators of Teachers College, Columbia University and the larger TC community. Host & Moderator:  Dr. Thomas P. Rock, Vice Provost for Enrollment Services at Teachers College Presenter:  Dr. Rahul Choudaha  www.dreducation.com , advisor, speaker, researcher and blogger on internationalization of higher education with a focus on student mobility and experience, enrollment management, and academic innovation. Sponsor:  Teachers College, Columbia University Please note that there will be a reception at the conclusion of the workshop from  8:30-9:00 p.m.  in the Everett Lounge @ Teachers College.
